description: Partial demolition, alteration, extension and change of use of buildings A, B, D, F and associated outbuildings and structures, to provide a mixed  use  scheme comprising 204  residential units, serviced apartments, business (B1 office), 5,858 sq.m. retail (A1,A2 and A3/A4) and leisure (D2) performance rehearsal and storage space in connection with theatre use, with associated 103 parking spaces and landscaping.
decision_conditions: REASON:  The scale of the proposed development of Block B is unacceptable in regard, in particular, to the quantity and quality of the residential accommodation proposed and results in the provision of affordable housing which lacks sufficient provision of amenity space and the social amenity space.  The development was considered to lack such amenity space across the entire development.  This is contrary to Strategic policy 4.2 which states ' In determining planning applications, to ensure that housing provides appropriate and acceptable accommodation in a good environment' and policies H3 and D3 of the London Borough of Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002.
